programme.title: Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 07:38.08, United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Cameron McEvoy (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 21.25 seconds, Benjamin Proud (GBR) took Silver and Florent Manaudou (FRA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Backstroke was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Kaylee McKeown (AUS) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 2:03.73, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Kylie Masse (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Aquatics
programme.desc: The best diving, swimming and water polo stories from throughout Olympic history including Dawn Fraser, Greg Louganis and Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Marathon
programme.desc: The best moments from the Olympic Games’ ultimate endurance events with stories from Emil Zatopek and Frank Shorter.

programme.title: Strangest Moments | Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode: a crazy marathon race, the Greg Louganis story, a false start disaster, why everyone loves Derek Redmond, and the forgotten Olympics.

programme.title: Group All-Around Final | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Group All-Around Final which took place at the Porte de La Chapelle Arena, France, on the 10/08/24. The People´s Republic of China claimed Gold, Israel took Silver and Italy completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 25m Pistol Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Shooting 25m Pistol Finals were held on 03/08/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre, Paris. Yang Jiin (KOR) claimed Gold, Camille Jedrzejewski (FRA) SIlver and Veronika Major (HUN) completed the podium

programme.title: Mat B: Men's & Women's Freestyle - Day 14 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's Freestyle 74kg and 125kg Semifinals and Freestyle 57kg and 86kg Finals. Rei Higuchi (JPN) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 57kg and Magomed Eldarovitch Ramazanov (BUL) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 86kg. As well as the Women's Freestyle 62kg Semifinals and Freestyle 57kg Finals. Tsugumi Sakurai (JPN) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 57kg.

programme.title: Olympic Outposts - Episode 3: A global journey to discover sports passions in the most unlikely places.
programme.desc: Journey to the opposite ends of the world as our hosts explore the Senegalese wrestling mashup style, Jamaica’s rugby developing scene or Break dance tradition in South Korea.

programme.title: Russia’s Aleksandr Karelin (extended)
programme.desc: Three-time Olympic champion Aleksandr Karelin now has the Kremlin as the ultimate goal, having swapped the sporting arena for politics

programme.title: Women's Boulder & Lead Finals | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Boulder & Lead Finals took place at Le Bourget Climbing Venue, France, on 10/08/2024. Janja Garnbret (SLO) won the Gold with a total of 168.5 points. Brooke Raboutou (USA) won the Silver and Jessica Pilz (AUT) completed the podium.

programme.title: Gamers Vs: Episode 4
programme.desc: Popular Gamers apply their gaming skills to Olympic sports with the help of world-class athletes and international coaches but how does it apply to the sports of Climbing, Dressage and Karate.

programme.title: Women's -67kg & Men's -80kg Repechages/Finals | Taekwondo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's -67kg & Men's -80kg Repechages/Finals which took place at the Grand Palais on 09/08/24.
The Women's -67Kg was won by Viviana Marton (HUN) with Gold, Aleksandra Perisic (SRB) with Silver and a tie in Bronze by Kristina Teachout (USA) and Sarah Chaari (BEL).
The Men's -80kg was won by Firas Katoussi (TUN) with Gold, Mehran Barkhordari (IRI) with Silver and Bronze for Simone Alessio (ITA) and Edi Hrnic (DEN).

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode: carbon fiber pole vaults, oxygen volume tests, synchro swimming cameras, taekwondo wireless scoring systems, and cross bike dampers.

programme.title: Men's Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Triathlon Final took place on day five of the Olympic Games Paris 2024 at Pont Alexandre III on July 31, 2024 in Paris, France.
Alex Yee (GBR) won Gold, Hayden Wilde (NZL) won Silver and Leo Bergere (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Meet the entourage of Shibutani Siblings, Fabian Gomez and Mohamed Lahna
programme.desc: Maia Shibutani (USA) x Big brother Alex Shibutani; Fabian Gomez (ARG) x Caddie Coco Monteros; Mohamed Lahna (MAR) x Advocate Alan Shanken

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 6
programme.desc: A new Trinidad star throws himself into the record books, Killy leaves his mark, oldest Olympians, and Kenyan Steeplechase dominance.

programme.title: FRA-POL - Men's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. France won Gold with a final score FRA 3:0 POL.

programme.title: Can Jackie Silva get this Brazilian volleyball team to defeat their rival?
programme.desc: Brazilian Olympic gold medalist Jackie Silva lends her expertise to a Rio indoor volleyball team as they try to win their first event ever.

programme.title: Tuskers Volleyball Club
programme.desc: Team USA Olympic hero Danielle Scott-Arruda travels to London, England to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling volleyball team.

programme.title: Women's 71kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Weightlifting Women's 71kg took place at the South Paris Arena 6 on 09/08/24. Olivia Reeves (USA) won the Gold medal, Mari Leivis Sanchez (COL) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Angie Paola Palacios Dajomes (ECU).

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode: carbon fiber pole vaults, oxygen volume tests, synchro swimming cameras, taekwondo wireless scoring systems, and cross bike dampers.

programme.title: Olympic Outposts - Episode 3: A global journey to discover sports passions in the most unlikely places.
programme.desc: Journey to the opposite ends of the world as our hosts explore the Senegalese wrestling mashup style, Jamaica’s rugby developing scene or Break dance tradition in South Korea.

programme.title: Jumping Team Final | Equestrian | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Jumping Team Final took place at Chateau de Versailles, Versailles, on 02/08/24. Great Britain won the Gold Medal, Unietd States won the Silver Medal, and France won Bronze.

programme.title: How horses help people overcome challenges and be their best selves.
programme.desc: Olympic Equestrian silver medallist Lucy Davis explores the immense healing power of horses and learns how her sport is changing lives.

programme.title: Jumping Individual Final | Equestrian | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Jumping Individual Final took place at Chateau de Versailles on 06/08/24. Christian KUKUK (GER) won the Goldel Medal, Steve GUERDAT (SUI) won the Silver Medal and the Bronze Medal was for Maikel Van der VLEUTEN (NED).

programme.title: The Olympic spirit : Greek gift, the ancient games
programme.desc: The Olympic Series Vol.3, Program 1 : The Olympic spirit : Greek gift, the ancient games.

programme.title: Teams Free Routine | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Teams Free Routine took place at Aquatics Centre, Paris, on 06/08/24.

programme.title: Flag and Family 1
programme.desc: Profiles of what it means to be a first-generation athlete as they try to balance national and personal identities.

programme.title: Fashion Behind The Games: Threads and Technology
programme.desc: Explore how the evolution of technology has helped athletes to improve their performances at the Olympic Games.

programme.title: Duets Free Routine Final | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Duets Free Routine Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 10/08/24. Liuyi Wang/Quianyi Wang (CHN) won Gold, Kate Shortman/Isabelle Thorpe (GBR) won Silver and Bregje de Brouwer/Noortje de Brouwer (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Episode 2 : How two of the world’s best synchro clubs strike a balance
programme.desc: Members of Aquanuts and Aquamaids reveal the sacrifices -- both inside the pool and out -- required for elite synchronised swimming.

programme.title: The camera technology bringing Synchronised Swimming to another level
programme.desc: Twin Cam - a camera that avoids refraction - allows athletes and coaches to observe movement in and out of the water in one single image.

programme.title: Individual All-Around Qualification - Morning | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Individual All-Around Qualification took place at Porte de La Chapelle Arena on 08/08/24.

programme.title: All Around | It’s Not All Work
programme.desc: In the seventh episode of the gymnastics show All Around: Angelina is back to training after her first ever snowboarding trip; Morgan and her mother open up about the adoption story; Yile, who has made big progress on recovery, enjoys some fun training games with her teammates and coaches. All Around is the Olympic Channel's first original gymnastics documentary series, with new episodes released monthly until Tokyo 2020. Watch now!

programme.title: All Around | The Calm Before the Storm
programme.desc: In the eight episode of the gymnastics show All Around: Morgan is at US team camp perfecting her Olympic year routines; Yile enjoys some family time for the Chinese New Year; and Angelina is prepping for a busy competition season. All Around is the Olympic Channel's first original gymnastics documentary series, with new episodes released monthly until Tokyo 2020. Watch now!

programme.title: All Around | All Systems Pause
programme.desc: In the ninth episode of the gymnastics show All Around: the world of sports is interrupted by the Covid-19 pandemic; Morgan comes back from winning American Cup 2020 to see Delaware under lockdown and her gym closed; Yile and the Chinese gymnastics team continue training in isolation under the lockdown; And Angelina is having trouble focusing on her training in the light of competitions being cancelled.

programme.title: Group All-Around Qualification | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session contains the Group All-Around Qualification which took place at La Chapelle Arena, Paris at 08/08/2024.
